MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA7 postcode area of Bishopton. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:22PM on Friday 16 April 2021.
